"Snurgle" - a verb meaning to make a happy, contented snuggling sound.
"Gleebler" - a noun meaning a person who is constantly coming up with wild, out-of-the-box ideas.
"Flibbly" - a noun meaning a person who is constantly fumbling and making mistakes.
"Blimble" - a verb meaning to move quickly and erratically.
"Fimbler" - a verb meaning to walk or move in a slow, stumbling manner.
